review: Works just like it said. I'm satisfied
author: vincent Basnight

review: Effortlessly  I can connect to Netflix  and Amazon  streamed entertainment.  The quality of the picture  is excellent . This was what I wanted with the fire stick and that was what I got
author: Carolyn Bennett

review: Love it!!! Extremely easy to use and makes purchasing Prime more worth it now! I also love that it doesn't take up space (like a box), got enough of those already attached to my tv.
author: USA424

review: Love it. Very happy I read the reviews. Arrived quickly, easy to install, excellent price.Love all of the different movies and reality tv that are offered through Prime and now am able to view on full screen tv.
author: goldendoodle

review: This is a great product!  We have Dish TV, but are now always using the Fire Stick.  Only wish the remote was bigger, but other than that we love it!
author: lisa saldana

review: Everything and more than I expected.  My girls love the programming  (9 and 18).  My 18 year old installed it and said it was easy to install.  There are games, movies, TV programs, and music all easily accessible with the included remote.  I am very happy with my purchase.
author: Kathy Siegel
